channel.title: knob on Daniele Antonioli
channel.description: Recent content in knob on Daniele Antonioli

item.title: KNOB Attack Repository is Online
item.description: Our KNOB repository is online, and it includes our PoC. For more information visit knobattack.com

item.title: Key Negotiation Of Bluetooth (KNOB) Attack
item.description: The embargo is over! The information about The KNOB is Broken: Exploiting Low Entropy in the Encryption Key Negotiation Of Bluetooth BR/EDR, including our research paper, CVE details, and media coverage, are publicly available at knobattack.com
